metadata.feature_description: Retrieve global URL management configuration including locale settings and sorting options

steps.action: Navigate to Settings > SEO > URL Management
steps.expected: URL Management configuration panel should load with settings displayed
steps.actual: URL Management panel loaded successfully showing GENERAL SETTINGS tab with URL REWRITER and URL REDIRECTS sections, all configuration options visible and functional

steps.action: Navigate to Pages > select Home page > Advanced > S.E.O. tab to verify configuration is applied to URL lists
steps.expected: Page URL list should display with columns reflecting the configured sorting fields (URL, Status)
steps.actual: Page URL list displayed correctly with columns: URL, URL TYPE (Status), GENERATED BY. Three URLs shown: / (Active 200), /redirect-url-edited (Redirect 301), /test-url-alpha (Redirect 301). Configuration is properly applied.

observations: GetConfiguration API endpoint returns SingleLocale flag and SortingFields enum (None=0, Url, Locale, Status) as verified in source code at UrlManagementServiceController.cs lines 485-495
Site has 5 locales configured (EN-US, ES-AR, FR-FR, DE-DE, AR-ER), so SingleLocale would return false
The Locale column is not visible in the page-specific URL list - this may be controlled by the SingleLocale flag or content localization settings
URL list columns (URL, URL TYPE/Status, GENERATED BY) align with the SortingFields enum for sorting capabilities
